title: Photo Book of Buddhist Holy Places
description: Photo Book of Buddhist Holy Places (Buddha pilgrimage sites) (Pictures of ancient Buddhist temples, stupas, shrines and monasteries) This book takes you on a pictorial journey of the most popular Buddhist holy sites in various countries. Suitable for both adults and children, one will learn about the significance of these places in Buddhism. Scroll to the top and select the "BUY" button for instant download. Happy reading!Tags - buddhist, temple, buddhism, religion, asia, buddha, asian, culture, architecture, travel, worship, religious, ancient, spirituality, monastery, southeast, east, pilgrimage, shrine, historical, sculpture, meditation, spiritual, eastern, sightseeing, monument
author: Merrily Home
